# Functions

This page lists the key functions in **EV-Net**.

````         

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(devtools)
library(Rd2md)

load_all(".")

# Only exported symbols
funs <- getNamespaceExports("EVNet")

for (f in funs) {

  rd_file <- file.path("man", paste0(f, ".Rd"))
  if (!file.exists(rd_file)) next

  rd <- tools::parse_Rd(rd_file)

  # 1️⃣ Skip datasets
  is_data <- any(grepl("\\\\docType\\{data\\}", rd))
  if (is_data) next

  # 2️⃣ Skip internal functions
  is_internal <- any(grepl("\\\\keyword\\{internal\\}", rd))
  if (is_internal) next

  # ---- Render function ----
  cat("\n\n# ", f, "\n\n")

  md_file <- tempfile(fileext = ".md")
  Rd2md::Rd2markdown(rdfile = rd_file, outfile = md_file)
  cat(readLines(md_file), sep = "\n")
}
```
````
